name: Spirit Mixer
description:
You play as a Spirit bartender trapped in purgatory, mixing and serving Spirits to other Spirits.

Created for Minijam 25: Spirits (Late), Limitation was No Text.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Phase Through Objects (Warning! Drops whatever you're holding!)
  • E - Use
  • Space - Pick up/Put down

How To Play

Keep your customers happy and collect stars by fulfilling drink orders before the time runs out! There are no fail conditions. Pick up a mug and use it on one of the colored taps to get started! Be sure to serve the Spirits their favorite drink or they'll smash it on the floor, resulting in lost profits!
